Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 
http://www.cityonfire.com/watch-the-trailer-for-lionsgates-imperial-bodyguard-the-guardsman/

 It relates the story of Emperor Qian Long travelling in a town with his main bodyguard Shu Ying, a few other men, two women and his servant.

They are the targets of a group of rebels wanting the return of the Ming dynasty, a group of Japanese warriors who join forces with the rebels and a man who wants to get revenge for his father's death.

Among the rebels, there is a former friend of Shu Ying who had the same master as him.

After several fights, there are only two bodyguards left with Shu Ying and he asks help from another friend of his (Yuen Biao) who doesn't want to help him because he holds him reponsible for his wife's death.

Qian Long's group is helped by an old doctor (Wu Ma) and his daughter (and previously by the owner of the inn, Cheng Pei Pei ) and finally by the man who wanted to kill Qian Long to get revenge, together with a man who uses a whip to fight the Japanese.

While they are trying to escape, Shu Ying's " brother " (in martial arts school) stops the Japanese and the rebels from killing Qian Long and he is killed by one of them who tries to make the others believe that he is a traitor and before killing him he tells him that it's him who killed his wife, and not the Emperor.
